name: Super CYG 2
description:
This is Super CYG 2!

Wait for it to load and then press the flag button in the middle.

You can also download this game if you don't have Flash or you want the game screen larger.

There are 4 possible ways to control this game.

1:  W, A and D

2 : Up, Left and Right

3:  Space, Left and Right

4: Space, A and D
